backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling lead submissions, payment marking with authorization, and urgency slot tracking with timed resets.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing replacement of the QR asset with a user-uploaded image and listing related components and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx with minimal page structure.
frontend/public/env.example.json: Example environment file specifying required keys for backend canister ID and network mode.
frontend/public/env.json: Production environment configuration providing the backend canister ID and network setting.
frontend/README.md: Project documentation outlining features, payment configuration, admin access, and setup instructions for the Canva Pro landing page.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing the user flow between form, payment, and confirmation along with an admin panel toggle.
frontend/src/components/AdminSubmissions: Admin-only table view showing all submissions with payment status, timestamps, and access-denied handling.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: Warning banner component that displays when the backend is unreachable, based on connectivity state.
Form component that collects user details and submits them to the backend while handling validation, submission states, and connectivity checks.
frontend/src/components/OfferDetails.tsx: Displays pricing, discount, and feature details for the Canva Pro offer using styled UI components.
frontend/src/components/PaymentConfirmat: Shows a confirmation message after payment with timeline details and next steps for the user.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSection.t: Provides QR payment options, a fallback payment link, and lets users mark their order as paid via backend interaction.
frontend/src/components/UrgencyBanner.ts: Fetches and displays remaining urgency slots with loading and fallback handling.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Loads environment config and creates a properly configured backend actor for local and production environments.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Defines static payment configuration including the UPI payment link, amount, and product description.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor, updating it based on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectivit: Runs a lightweight backend check using an actor call to determine reachability and connection status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing ICP Internet Identity login, loading saved identities, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching submissions and performing create/mark-as-paid mutations via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUrgencySlots.ts: React Query hook that polls remaining urgency slots from the backend actor every 10 seconds.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Normalizes and logs actor-related errors into structured categories with user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for getting, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, architecture notes, known issues, and feature definitions for a lead-collection and payment-flow app using Apps Script, Sheets, and a frontend. Includes image replacement requirements and flags this update as a fix request.
